Header: Police finds Rs. 10.5 million worth gold robbed from a Nugegoda shop; CCTV footage
Content: About 1.5kg of gold worth Rs. 10.5 million was robbed from a jewelry shop in Nugegoda. Police said the robbery took place on the 09 th last month. Two employees at the shop were arrested in connection to the theft. Upon questioning a third suspect was identified. The gold were found in a house in Dehiwala. CCTV footage of the robbery was released.
